translations: v．使不安，使困惑：使某人感到不安、困惑或担忧。
· The sudden change in plans disconcerts everyone.
计划的突然改变让每个人都感到不安。

sentences.sentence: My mother would release her disconcerts by sullen drones of complaints and scoldings, as befitted her role of the disciplinarian of the family.
sentences.translation: 我母亲会通过絮絮叨叨地抱怨和斥责来排解她的不称心，正如她在家里所扮演的严格执行纪律的角色。
